body:
Day 11 - Manga 254*
I came here to rate hentais and, four pages out of thirty two seem small. Nevertheless, didn't understood the story, it seemed like the small girl knew about her future, that she was gonna get killed, but still did nothing, wanting to be saved. Also the other guy seemed to be fucking the two girls that only appeared that time, giving me no satisfaction from seeing them and giving me no reason to why I should care. 
Overhaul, it seems that to understand the story, you need to know the original since many of the important factors are left out and the hentai gave me no emotion that I came here to feel since it was short and involved characters that hadn't appeared before with an important role.
4/10. The art was kinda nice but I didn't like it that much.
true story: I was reading this like it was a normal Higurashi manga and then page 12 came in. I realized this was a doujin
Pretty interesting if you know the story 7/10
Interesting world, i wonder what would happen if keiichi and satoshi were at the same time in hinamisawa. Sadly no fap.
